About Me

UI Designer & Web Developer

My name is Mesfin.I'm a web designer and developer based in Espoo, Finland. I studied Media Engineering and also about to graduate from Laurea UAS in the Business Information Technology department. Apart from my studies, I am also a self-taught developer. My main expertise is web development, I can create cross-browser, responsive, and interactive sites. Please see my projects above..
